text: jo sinhaasan ko uthae hue hai aur jo usake chaturdik hain, apane rab ka gunagaan karate hai aur us par eemaan rakhate hai aur un logon ke lie kshama kee praarthana karate hai jo eemaan lae ki "ai hamaare rab! too har cheez ko vyaapt hai. atah jin logon ne tauba kee aur tere maarg ka anusaran kiya, unhen kshama kar de aur bhadakatee huee aag kee yaatana se bacha len
